//Would Carry Me Home tonight/ <VigzMv/>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int carry(int a, int b, int c, int count);
int main()
{
    int a,b,c;
    cin >> a>> b;
    while(a || b)
    {
       c = carry(a,b,0, 0);
       if(c > 1)
       	cout << c << " carry operations.";
       else if(c ==1 )
       	cout << c << " carry operation.";
       else cout << "No carry operation.";
       	cout << endl << endl;
       cin >> a >> b;
    }
}
 
int carry(int a, int b, int c, int count)
{
     	int x, y;
     	if(a,b)
     {
     	x = a%10;
     	y = b%10;
     	if(x+y+c>9)
     	count++;
     	
    	c = (x+y+c)/10;
     	a = a/10;
     	b = b/10;
     	carry(a,b,c, count);
     }
     else
     return count;
}
